image_requirements.description: Required in order below (2 images): 1. Hero (Main) Image: Pair laid out. 2. 1st Alternate: Item in Packaging.

summary: The page provides photo direction guidelines for styling and presenting socks, including both single pairs and packs of 3-5, specifying required images and their order.
